Articles.Content:
I'm Deer, and I am relatively new to KSP. I am able to get rockets into orbit, however I can not do it correctly time after time.

It seems I can get a steady orbit maybe 1 in 10 Launches, on 3 or so different ships.

I know someone will tell me to just read another part of the forum, but posting in the "Welcome Aboard" section seemed appropriate for my first post.

<3
